v8:item.v8:content: Closing the books helps you prevent changes to transactions dated prior to the closing date.
Anyone who tries to save changes must either acknowledge a warning or enter the password to save the change.
Offsets the left margin for printing checks, in millimiters (for example, -5 or +10)
Offsets the top margin for printing checks, in millimiters (for example, -5 or +10)
The image proportion should be 167x100 pixels
If you would like your logo in our emailed invoices. Place the URL to your logo image.
Use preview features at your own risk!
This email is required for email invoicing. Click "Verify e-mail" to receive a verification link from Amazon SES, and confirm it, so we can send e-mails on your behalf
